allData.introduction: Certified yoga instructor with 8 years of experience. Specializing in Vinyasa and Hatha yoga. Passionate about helping others find inner peace through mindful movement.

allData.introduction: Yoga practitioner for 12 years, focusing on Power Yoga and Meditation. Former athlete turned yoga teacher, helping others achieve peak performance.
